tool_description: A comprehensive tool for checking backlinks, including top backlinks, new backlinks, and poor backlinks.

api_list.name: Exact URL (Non English)
api_list.description: Retrieve backlinks for a specific non-English URL.

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: The non-English URL for which to check backlinks.

api_list.name: New Backlinks
api_list.description: Get a list of new backlinks and their counts for a specified domain.

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: The domain for which to retrieve new backlinks.

api_list.name: Poor Backlinks
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of poor backlinks and their counts for a specified domain.

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: The domain for which to check poor backlinks.

api_list.name: Top Backlinks
api_list.description: Get a list of top backlinks and their counts for a specified domain.

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: The domain for which to retrieve top backlinks.

api_list.name: Exact URL
api_list.description: Retrieve backlinks for a specific URL.

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: The URL for which to check backlinks.
